constraints.name: area_upper_bound
constraints.description: 任意三个点构成的三角形面积不超过 S
constraints.formal: ∀i, j, k ∈ [1, n], area(p_i, p_j, p_k) ≤ S

constraints.name: enclosing_triangle_area
constraints.description: 包含所有给定点的三角形面积不超过 4S

constraints.name: integer_coordinates
constraints.description: 结果三角形的顶点坐标必须是整数且绝对值不超过 10^9
